These technologies and services are used to collect, preserve, and examine physical evidence, trace materials, and digital data to establish facts, identify suspects, and provide evidence for legal proceedings. Market Trends: The increasing use of digital devices and communication means a growing volume of digital evidence is available. Forensic services are required to analyze this evidence, from data on smartphones and computers to cloud-based information, to solve cybercrimes and other digital offenses. Market Drivers: Develop and provide specialized software and tools for forensic analysts, crime scene investigators, and digital forensics experts.
